path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Gamr Smart Contract Final Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Contract issues related to functionality
findings.description: The contract is a BEP20 token with some modifications done on it. Contract gets compiled but while testing the unStake() function does not pass. The reason being there is another token used to transfer but according to the client it was not supposed to be there.

findings.title: Users are unable to unstake tokens because of the tax values
findings.description: In function unStake() users can unstake their staked tokens. But because of the high tax value 110*500000/100 = 550000 so function overflows at line reward = reward.sub(reward_tax)

findings.title: changeAdmin() should be two step process
findings.description: The changeAdmin() function should adopt a two-factor mechanism to prevent mistakenly transferring admin roles to zero or wrong addresses.
